summary: Most fixes are in place, but the enterprise tier user limit is still incorrect and does not match the sprint plan.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Enterprise tier user limit incorrect (should be 10, not 100)
previous_issues_status.notes: Current code still uses user: 100 for enterprise; sprint plan requires 1000/10/200.
Now retries on NOSCRIPT after reloading script.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: parseRateLimitResult unsafe parsing and dimension validation
previous_issues_status.notes: Now uses safeInt and validates dimension, fail-closed on unknown.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Still referencing crypto.randomUUID after import change
